```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
print_member_table = function(path, num_cols = 4)
{
  member_table = yaml::read_yaml(path) %>% 
    do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% 
    tidyr::unnest() %>%
    tibble::as.tibble() %>%
    dplyr::mutate(content = paste0("<center><a href='",
                                   url,
                                   "' target='_blank'>",
                                   "<img border = '0' src = '",
                                   picture,
                                   "' width = '150'></a><br><a href='",
                                   url,
                                   "' target='_blank'>",
                                   name,
                                   "</a></center>")) %>%
    dplyr::select(content) %>%
    unlist()
  nn = length(member_table)
  member_table %<>% 
    c(rep("", (num_cols-(nn %% num_cols)) %% num_cols)) %>%
    matrix(ncol = num_cols, byrow = TRUE) %>%
    as.data.frame()
  
  DT::datatable(member_table,
                escape = FALSE,
                options = list(dom = 't'),
                rownames = FALSE,
                colnames = c("",""))
}
```

## Faculty

